INIT.title1: Do you know what you are looking for?
INIT.info1: We have prepared for you a great list of categories with the best providers in your city at your disposal!
INIT.info2: Do not worry, tell us every detail of what you are looking for, we will take care of giving you the best advice!

TUTORIAL.title1: Have access to the best services
TUTORIAL.info1: Find the best service providers in your city, filter according to your location and receive answers instantly
TUTORIAL.title2: Select the perfect provider for you
TUTORIAL.info2: Check the experience and availability of suppliers, so you can find the one that best suits your needs
TUTORIAL.info3: Create service requests to your favorite provider, update the status and have satisfactory answers
TUTORIAL.title4: Track your request in real time
TUTORIAL.info4: Track your provider, access the details of location and time when your service will be delivered
TUTORIAL.title5: Rate and save your services for your future requests
TUTORIAL.info5: Our suppliers are qualified for their previous services, keep them and create bonds of trust to contact them again

ALERT.title: Important Announcement
ALERT.msg: Our services will begin to be provided from February 14, 2020.
